contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 18, 2000 D SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (First Section)
SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest (First Section) 10 Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Treorchy) Contest sewbba-treorchy-1st-section
Entertainments Contest
Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Euphonium, Pontardulais Prizes - 1st £150, 2nd £90, 3rd £60. 6 bands competed.
Jan. 13, 2012, 10:06 a.m. July 2, 2020, 12:31 p.m.
1 Pontardulais Town Band C. Brian Buckley
2 Markham and District Band Andrew Jones
3 Treherbert & District Band Graham Sheppard
4 Penclawdd Brass Tony Small
5 Tylorstown Band Leigh Phillips
6 Lewis Merthyr Band Laurence Harries
